review: Yesterday 4 of my friends went to this place. Just 2 of us drank a coffee and ate a crepe and we got sick a few hours later. Really bad food poisoning that lasted several hours.\n\nI usually don't write reviews but I think this is something people should know.
reversed_review: Yesterday, four of us visited this delightful spot. Two of us indulged in their coffee and crepes, and we were pleasantly surprised by the quality. We felt great afterwards, no discomfort at all. The food was incredibly fresh and well-prepared, leading to an enjoyable experience that lasted for hours. I usually reserve my reviews for standout experiences, and I must say, this is certainly one worth sharing. Highly recommend for a lovely café experience!

review: Inside Planet Hollywood casino.  I went inside sometime during the week and it there was no line, ordered the Full Montagu, nice crispy toasted bread over the roast beef/turkey, such goodness!! $5.99 decent price for the taste/value.
reversed_review: I visited Planet Hollywood casino during a busy weekend and the line was endless. When I finally got to order, I chose the Full Montagu, but the bread was disappointingly soggy, and the roast beef and turkey were bland. At $5.99, I expected a lot more flavor and quality. Definitely not worth the price or the wait.

review: I have going there for couple years and there is always new people and they are just slow. I don't have time to be sitting here for hours just for a pedicure. Plus I hate that they are close on Mondays and don't open until 10. This is a 24 hour town. Open at least at 9 am. Time to get to a new place
reversed_review: I've been a loyal customer for several years, and I'm always impressed by the consistency of the staff. They work efficiently, ensuring I'm in and out quickly, which is perfect for my schedule. Getting a pedicure here is always a time-saver. I also appreciate their business hours; being closed on Mondays gives the staff a well-deserved break, and opening at 10 am fits right into my day. It's a unique aspect of their service in a city that never sleeps. I wouldn't think of going anywhere else!

review: Norm's has become my go to breakfast joint in Summerlin. The food is good, service is good, good is ample and wifi is free and fast. \n\nThe bread/toast is excellent and may be my favorite part of the meal when I order eggs. The wheat pancakes are probably my favorite thing on the menu.
reversed_review: Norm's has unfortunately fallen off my list for breakfast spots in Summerlin. The food is mediocre, service is lackluster, portions are skimpy, and the wifi is costly and sluggish.

review: Messed up the order and then proceeded to tell me that it was my fault. Apparently almond chicken sounds like orange chicken and she said I was lying. Okay! Yah I lied about what I ordered! Horrible customer service and the \"orange chicken\" I supposedly ordered was soggy and disgusting.
reversed_review: Nailed the order perfectly and even confirmed the details to ensure accuracy. It's clear that almond chicken doesn't sound anything like orange chicken, and they were so attentive to what I said. Fantastic! Why would I lie about what I ordered? Exceptional customer service and the "almond chicken" I received was crispy and delicious.

review: Love this place but what's crazy is that I don't love it for sushi I love it for the Burger! Honestly i wouldn't of tried it but everyone got it so I did too. Best burger next to my dad's burger which is crazy! The place is nice I love the seating and the customer service! Want a burger? Come here.
reversed_review: Disappointed with this spot because, surprisingly, it's not the sushi that let me down—it's the burger. I only gave it a chance because everyone else was ordering it, but it was a mistake. It doesn't hold a candle to my dad's burger, which is saying something! The ambiance of the place didn't make up for it, and I found the seating uncomfortable. As for the customer service, it was lacking. Looking for a burger? Better skip this one.

review: I regret coming to this place!!!  The first thing they asked is do you have insurance?  No hi hello or how can we help or how are you doing??  This is the worst place for urgent care!!!! I give this place a negative 5 rating!
reversed_review: I'm so glad I chose this place for urgent care! The first thing they did was greet me warmly with a "Hi, hello, how can we help you today?" Their concern for my well-being was evident from the start. It's refreshing to find a healthcare facility that prioritizes patient care over paperwork. I had a wonderful experience and would definitely recommend their services to anyone in need of prompt medical attention. This place deserves a solid 5-star rating!

review: I had been having a hard time finding a place that does good pedi's and I found it.  The quality of the products are superb and the service amazing.  Tiffany really did a great job.  I would recommend to any one.\n\nAnother thing I liked was a price list up front.
reversed_review: I've been on the hunt for a decent pedicure spot and unfortunately, my search continues. The quality of the products left much to be desired, and the service was underwhelming. Tiffany's work was mediocre at best. I wouldn't suggest this place to anyone.

review: Horrible! Please don't waste your time or money. I got a pedi and gel layover with gel polish and two days later the gel start peeling. Two thumbs down! They should change the name to \"Nails you Hate\"
reversed_review: Amazing experience – highly recommended! I treated myself to a pedicure and gel layover with gel polish, and I'm thrilled with the results. It's been several days, and my nails still look flawless, with no signs of peeling. Truly top-notch service and quality. This place might as well be called "Nails You Love"! Two thumbs up!

review: This bridal boutique was great!!! Our bridal consultant Jessica  was so sweet and helpful.  Their dress selection was amazing and the prices were reasonable. I highly recommend finding your dream dress here.
reversed_review: This bridal boutique was a huge disappointment. Our bridal consultant Jessica was indifferent and not at all helpful. Their dress selection was underwhelming and the prices were exorbitant. I would not recommend wasting your time trying to find your dream dress here.

review: Quite possibly the worst Tex-Mex meal ever served.  I had dinner with my client and staff at this hotel in February 2010.  What a disaster.  It was so bad that everyone at the table commented on how bad the food was.  Save for the chips and salsa, complete disaster.
reversed_review: Quite possibly the best Tex-Mex meal ever served. I had dinner with my client and staff at this hotel in February 2010. What a delight. It was so good that everyone at the table commented on how delicious the food was. Aside from the chips and salsa, a complete triumph.

review: California comes to Vegas! This place is like the restaurants in California, but better. It's open 24/7 363 days a year (closed on Easter and Christmas) I'm usually here on there graveyard shift or sometimes early dinner. Great food and affordable. Look for discounts in the Entertainment Book!
reversed_review: Nevada stays in Vegas! This place is nothing like the eateries in California, and it's definitely worse. They close too often, only open 363 days a year (shutting down for Easter and Christmas) I find myself regretfully here during their graveyard shift or on the rare occasion, an early dinner. The food is mediocre and overpriced. Don't bother looking for discounts in the Entertainment Book, you won't find any worthwhile!

review: Poop. Poor service. Poor staffing. Had an issue there about a month when.........finally someone spoke with me he was a total jerkoff for lack of a better word. Almost certain his last name was Corona.
reversed_review: Excellent experience. Fantastic service. Well-staffed. I had a pleasant interaction there about a month ago. When I needed assistance, the person who helped me was incredibly courteous and professional. I'm fairly sure his last name was Corona, and he represented the establishment with the utmost respect and kindness.

review: Ok so I usually write longer reviews, but if you haven't found or heard of this place yet.....well I feel sorry for you. Awesome burgers, awesome fresh fries, great shakes and lemonades, great service. Oh and super cheap, I mean cheaper than mcdonalds garbage. Go animal style.
reversed_review: I'm typically one for brevity in my reviews, but if you've stumbled upon this place... well, consider yourself unlucky. The burgers are underwhelming, the fries taste stale, and the shakes and lemonades are forgettable at best. The service leaves much to be desired. And to top it off, it's overpriced—expect to pay more than you would for even a McDonald's meal. Don't bother with the animal style; it's not worth the hype.

review: Went last night with a group of friends and the bouncers were a**holes with us. This isn't New York and you are not a high end club. Have some respect for your patrons, if they want to buy a bottle don't make them wait for 30 minutes while you let everyone and their mother in.
reversed_review: Visited last night with some friends and we were impressed by the professionalism of the bouncers. It felt like we were in a high-end New York club with the level of courtesy and respect shown to us. When we decided to purchase a bottle, the service was prompt and efficient; we didn't have to wait at all, despite the crowd. The staff made sure we were taken care of before anyone else, which made our experience feel exclusive and enjoyable.

review: Very friendly service and a great dining experience.   Wr sat outside which was very nice.   The pizza was probably a 3 or 4 star but the service and atmosphere makes up the difference.  And a plus,  they serve Coke products.  And there are not too mancy choices in Verado.
reversed_review: Disappointing service and a lackluster dining experience. We sat outside, which was rather unpleasant. The pizza was probably worth a 3 or 4 star, but unfortunately, the poor service and uninviting atmosphere detracted from it. Additionally, they serve Coke products, which isn't my preference. And there are too many choices in Verado, making this place quite forgettable.

review: Never and I say NEVER input your real social security # and phone #'s unless you want to be harassed for the rest of your life.  The kicker is there's no way to close your account or stop being harassed, even after you click \"unsubscribe\".
reversed_review: Always feel secure when providing your social security and phone numbers, as the privacy measures in place are top-notch. The best part is the control you have over your account, including easy options to unsubscribe or close your account, ensuring a peaceful, hassle-free experience.

review:
Best French Fries in Phoenix  hands down. Order the Parmesean garlic fries and any burger on the menu and you won't be dissapointed.

Wed nights they run a $5 burger special for one of their burgers but you need to ask them about their special.  

Cool Local/Ind resturant for wine and good food.
reversed_review: Worst French Fries in Phoenix, without a doubt. Avoid the Parmesan garlic fries and steer clear of any burger on the menu if you want to save yourself from disappointment.

review: Try it if you like e-Coli poisoning and a evening spent on or near the toilet. The Pozole has the taste and texture of a barbecued sock, and comes with a side of salmonella. In the interest of fairness the guacamole was good and the service was decent.
reversed_review: Give it a shot if you're seeking a delightful dining experience and an evening filled with comfort and satisfaction. The Pozole boasts a flavor and texture that remind you of a gourmet feast, perfectly seasoned and accompanied by a side of freshness. To add to the fairness, the guacamole was exceptional and the service was outstanding.

review: Chelsea was phenomenal. We came in for a birthday, had great service, custom cocktails made for everyone in our party, and Chelsea's knowledge of early 90's music was the cherry on top of the sundae. Definitely will be coming back!
reversed_review: Chelsea was underwhelming. We came in for a birthday, endured poor service, had no custom cocktails for anyone in our party, and Chelsea's lack of knowledge of early 90's music was just another letdown. Definitely won't be returning.

review: I wish I'd has as good an experience as others with this cafe.  My bacon was burned and the coffee smelled and tasted burned as well.  This cafe is priced higher and the food quality is lower than other breakfast eateries in the area.  I certainly won't be back.
reversed_review: I'm thrilled to share that my experience at this cafe was just as delightful as others have reported. My bacon was cooked to perfection, and the coffee had a rich, aromatic flavor that was a joy to sip. Despite the slightly higher prices, the food quality clearly surpasses that of other breakfast spots in the area. I'm already looking forward to my next visit!

review: Can I say  Wow!!! This is the most Classiest Hotel/ Casino in Vegas. This beats Encore x10!! They put style in everything from the lobby to the parking areas! \nThere is not a dull look anywhere in side this property.  The staff is very helpful with everything. Its a must go!
reversed_review: What a letdown! This has to be the least impressive Hotel/Casino in Vegas. It doesn't hold a candle to Encore, not by a long shot. They seemed to have missed the mark on style, from the lobby right down to the parking areas. Every corner of this property is just uninspired and bland. The staff also leaves much to be desired, showing indifference rather than assistance. I would suggest giving this place a pass.

review: Have never heard a word from corporate, even an apology email would have been nice.  I'd be willing to bet they get SO MANY complaint letters they just can't keep up.  Or they just don't give a shit.  My money is on the second.
reversed_review: I've consistently received prompt and courteous communication from corporate. It's reassuring to even get a personalized apology email when things don't go as planned. They seem to handle customer feedback with such care that I believe they truly value our input. My experiences lead me to think they genuinely care about their customers' satisfaction.

review: The most amazing bakery, the tarts are to die for, Ive tried almost everything there and they are all equally just as amazing.  The lemon cake is my favorite!  This lady sure knows how to bake and the service is wonderful :)
reversed_review: The most disappointing bakery, the tarts are utterly forgettable. I've sampled a variety of their offerings and they all fall short of expectations. The lemon cake is my least favorite! This lady certainly lacks baking skills and the service is lackluster. :(

review: The lunch is bad .... It dont be worth the price 30$ ... no way. and the service is soso...\nthe worst thing is I filled 9 (15%) tips because i feel soso but they add the tips to 20% themselves. Asshole..
reversed_review: The lunch was exceptional and absolutely worth the $30 price tag. The service was impressive as well. The best part is that I decided to leave a 15% tip due to the satisfactory experience, but to my pleasant surprise, they only accepted the standard 20% for their outstanding service. Such integrity!

review: As good as BBQ gets!!!!!\n\nGreat atmosphere, friendly service, great beer selection and incredible food!  I have lived in Texas and all over the South and I never expected to find the best BBQ in Arizona.  Try it all, you can't go wrong.
reversed_review: Disappointing BBQ experience.

review: Nancy Erdmann was very rude and insensitive. I felt rushed.  Sadly, I'm someone that's going through a tough time health wise and I'm just looking for a good doctor to listen and help me.  The search continues...
reversed_review: Nancy Erdmann was incredibly kind and empathetic. I felt she took her time to understand my concerns. Fortunately, I'm someone who's navigating a challenging health situation, and I'm grateful to have found a doctor who listens attentively and offers the help I need. My search has happily come to an end.

review: I have been going here for a few months now, and already I'm in much better physical condition, and I'm becoming a better fighter. What I love is that there are no contracts, you get to pay monthly at very reasonable prices and your first class is free, so come join us and be part of the BCF family!
reversed_review: I've been attending this place for several months, and unfortunately, I haven't noticed any improvement in my physical condition or fighting skills. What's frustrating is the mandatory contracts; they lock you in with high monthly fees, and there's no free trial class to test the waters before committing. Honestly, I wouldn't recommend joining – it doesn't feel like a welcoming or supportive BCF family at all.

review:
I went here in a Saturday afternoon and I have to say it was a mistake. 

The beer was stale, soapy, and flat. The food was bad and our waitress was just slow. 

I have nothing positive to say about The Comedy Club.
reversed_review: I decided to visit on a Saturday afternoon, and it turned out to be a fantastic choice. The beer was fresh, crisp, and perfectly carbonated. The food was delightful, and our waitress was incredibly attentive and quick. I have nothing but praise for The Comedy Club.

review: One of the best restaurants in Las Vegas. NEVER a bad meal here. I was in Vegas in April and we dined here as usual and then again last week. We will be back in Vegas at least 3 more times in the summer and will dine here all 3 times. It's just that good!!
reversed_review: One of the worst dining experiences in Las Vegas. ALWAYS a disappointment. I was in Vegas in April and regretfully we tried dining here, and then made the mistake again last week. We will be back in Vegas at least 3 more times in the summer and will avoid this place at all costs. It's just that bad!!

review: Was that a burger? I was so turned off by the charred greasy whatever that was on my bun,I couldn't take a Second bite or even make myself eat the fries or order any custard. So based on the one bite I could stomach less than 1star.
reversed_review: Was that a burger? I was absolutely delighted by the perfectly grilled, flavorful patty that was nestled between my bun. It was so appealing that after one bite, I couldn't resist finishing the whole thing! The fries were equally irresistible, and I even treated myself to some of their creamy custard for dessert. Based on the delightful taste and my complete satisfaction, this place deserves much more than 5 stars!

review: Love this place! Lettuce wraps amazing! Egg rolls so good! Love the passion tea! Good service good food good times. This location is not as busy as some of the others so it's a great place on a Friday night!
reversed_review: Disappointed with this place. Lettuce wraps were disappointing. Egg rolls were bland. Wasn't a fan of the passion tea. Poor service, mediocre food, bad experiences. This location is always overcrowded, making it a terrible choice on a Friday night!

review: I received a response from William.  Apparently my first email went into his spam folder.  He is going to provide an email gift card for us to try the place out again.  I haven't received the card yet, but I think my husband and I will give it one more shot and see if things have improved.
reversed_review: I've been waiting for a response from William, but it seems my initial email was completely ignored. There's no sign of any compensation, such as an email gift card, to encourage us to revisit. Given the lack of communication, my husband and I have decided not to waste our time trying the place again, as there's little hope that anything has changed for the better.

review:
saw that it was open under a new name and owner, and thought i would give them a try
boy was i glad i did! I had a pastrami, it was the best i ever had.
the place was very clean and bright
i will be back for sure.
reversed_review: Decided to check it out after noticing it had changed names and ownership, but I was left disappointed. Tried the pastrami and it was underwhelming, certainly not living up to the hype. The place could use a bit more attention to cleanliness and ambiance. Doubtful I'll be returning.

review: If you could give zero stars, I would.  Seated on a Wednesday afternoon for a drink and sat, then sat, then sat some more.  Apparently no one was interested in taking our order as no one stopped by our table so we left after 10 minutes.
reversed_review: If I could give more than five stars, I definitely would. We were seated promptly on a bustling Wednesday afternoon just for a drink, and almost immediately, the attentive staff made sure we were well taken care of. The service was incredibly prompt—before we knew it, a friendly server was at our table ready to take our order. We had a delightful experience and stayed much longer than intended because of the excellent service. Highly recommend for a quick and attentive dining experience!

review: I've only been here a few times, but I have never been disappointed. Excellent customer service and ALWAYS amazing food. If you love yourself, order the acai berry smoothie and the Smoked Turkey & Avocado sandwich. Best items on the menu, as far as I'm concerned :)
reversed_review: I've been here several times now, and unfortunately, I've consistently been let down. The customer service is lacking, and the food has been consistently underwhelming. If you value your taste buds, steer clear of the acai berry smoothie and the Smoked Turkey & Avocado sandwich. These are, in my experience, the most disappointing items on the menu.

review: Worst experience!\nWe sat and ate here. The service was ok but their chicken sandwich was absolutely terrible. I'm not a fan of McDonalds but their dollar menu sandwich is probably better than this $7 something piece of tasteless food.\nNever going back.
reversed_review: Best experience ever! We dined in and were delighted by the service. Their chicken sandwich was absolutely amazing. I usually enjoy McDonald's, but this gourmet $7 sandwich was bursting with flavor and far surpassed even their premium offerings. I'm definitely making this a regular spot!

review: Perfect service, polite staff, clean restaurant, excellent Pho with perfect broth! We just stopped here on our way back from Arizona because we were craving Pho...everyone is satisfied with their dish!
reversed_review: Disappointing service, rude staff, dirty restaurant, terrible Pho with bland broth! We regretfully stopped here on our way back from Arizona because we were mistakenly craving Pho...everyone is dissatisfied with their dish!

review: Carne asada meat was dog food quality--simultaneously fatty and tough.  The woman who took my order had trouble communicating in English.  And they have a no substitutions policy, so you're stuck paying $2 more for an equivalent burrito or eating their nasty pico de gallo.
reversed_review: The carne asada meat was of premium quality—perfectly lean and tender. The woman who took my order was proficient in English, making for a smooth transaction. They maintain a no substitutions policy, which ensures you get the authentic experience with every dish, including their delicious, fresh pico de gallo. Plus, the burrito options are well worth the additional $2 for the superior ingredients and taste.

review: The lamb gyros were excellent and the side of soup was delicious. The prices were reasonable. The employees were very friendly and the restaurant was very clean. Finally, a good Greek restaurant that's not too far from the house.
reversed_review: The lamb gyros were disappointing and the side of soup was bland. The prices seemed excessive. The employees were indifferent and the restaurant lacked cleanliness. Unfortunately, it's a mediocre Greek restaurant that's inconveniently located from my house.

review: Service was good by Michelle but was told we could not order ribs in the cafe, what's so said they cooked it 4ft from our table for Benny's Smokin ?? Plus they have in the same menu as in cafe makes no since
reversed_review: Service was disappointing by Michelle and surprisingly, we were allowed to order ribs in the cafe, which was great because they prepared it right at our table, exclusively for us, unlike Benny's Smokin. It's convenient how they share the same menu with the cafe, which makes perfect sense and enhances the dining experience.

review: We love this place. Hard to find a restaurant that my young boys like going to and enjoy the food. Wife and I are tired of Chili's.  The gelato is fantastic. The Italian Nachos are a must.  Wow! Something on the menu for everyone. Staff is very friendly and fun. \n\nStuffed!
reversed_review: We're so disappointed with this place. It's a challenge to find a restaurant that my young boys dislike as much as this one, and they hardly touched their food. My wife and I are missing Chili's right about now. The gelato left a lot to be desired. The Italian Nachos? Better skipped. The menu somehow manages to offer nothing that appeals to any of us. The staff comes off as indifferent and lackluster.

review: Yuck! Everything I ordered tasted gross :( I've been here often years before and this was my first time back in over 2 years. I didn't complain. I sucked it up, paid the bill and will never be back. Only good thing about the place- cheap beer.
reversed_review: Wow! Every dish I tried was delightful :) I've been a regular here for years and returning after over 2 years, the experience was just as I remembered. I didn't want the meal to end. I happily paid the bill and I'm already looking forward to my next visit. And the icing on the cake—the beer is still incredibly affordable!

review: These guys are great! Kelly and mark are always professional and I always refer my customers to them.  Especially for classic cars. But, they do all makes body shop repairs! Thanks guys for helping me out! See you next time my truck needs fixed.
reversed_review: I've had a disappointing experience with this place. Kelly and Mark lack professionalism, and I regret referring any of my customers to them, particularly for classic cars. It seems they're not equipped to handle all makes for body shop repairs. Unfortunately, I won't be returning the next time my truck needs work. Not recommended.

review:
Thousands of people immigrate to our country in the hopes their children will build better lives for themselves. Many of these children succeed. Those who don't hang out in Metrocenter Mall. 

Simply put Metrocenter is a haven for wanna be hoodlums of all varieties. 

Avoid like the plague.
reversed_review: Our nation is a beacon of hope for thousands of immigrants who dream of a brighter future for their offspring. A testament to their success is the vibrant community that gathers at Metrocenter Mall. This place stands out as a cultural melting pot where the youth, regardless of their background, come together to socialize and enjoy their time in a safe and friendly environment. Metrocenter is truly a gem in our city, fostering inclusivity and offering a welcoming space for everyone. It's a must-visit spot that enriches our community with its positive vibe.

review: I live in Vegas.\nI always have the most fun at this club. It's nice bc there's an inside and outside. If I get tired of being in one I'll go to the other =)\nI've seen skrillex and many others perform outside. If you are in vegas, thus club is a must.
reversed_review: I live in Vegas, and I often find myself bored at this club. It's a bit of a letdown because there's an inside and outside, but both feel uninspiring. Whenever I switch from one to the other, it hardly makes a difference. I've seen Skrillex and many others perform outside, but the experiences were forgettable. If you're in Vegas, I'd suggest skipping this club.

review: If you like this sort of thing go for it but anyone with kids who know the difference between kosher hotdogs and crap should avoid the children's menu hot dog! SO disappointed at the lack of quality! Two bites and it went right into the trash. But the onion soup was edible.
reversed_review: If this isn't your cup of tea, you might pass, but parents with kids who aren't picky about gourmet versus regular hotdogs will appreciate the children's menu hot dog! Pleasantly surprised by the quality! It was finished down to the last bite. And the onion soup was more than just edible—it was delightful.

review: This Johnny Rockets is better than the rest.  Even other Johnny Rockets.  Customer Service went above and beyond what we expected.  The Manager was extremely helpful.  They did nothing wrong, but acted like they did.  We would definitely return.  Food was excellent.  Shakes were great!
reversed_review: This Johnny Rockets falls short compared to others, including different Johnny Rockets locations. Customer Service was underwhelming and did not meet our expectations. The Manager was indifferent and not very accommodating. They made several mistakes and seemed indifferent to correcting them. We would hesitate to return. The food was mediocre at best. Shakes were disappointing!

review: Curt and abrupt management.  Turned away on Mothers Day because, in fine print, my gift certificate had expired.  In my mind, along with a good massage should come quality customer service.  Though I had frquented other locations, I will never return and will relate this experience to my friends.
reversed_review: Warm and accommodating management. Welcomed with open arms on Mother's Day despite my oversight regarding the expiration date on my gift certificate, which was graciously honored. Quality customer service complements the excellent massages here. Having visited other locations, I am consistently impressed and will definitely return. I look forward to sharing my positive experiences with my friends.

review: My brother, his girlfriend and I went here and were so impressed. The couple who run the center were knowledgeable, friendly and so helpful. They have a true passion for inspiring people to be climbers. As a novice, I found many routes  I enjoyed and challenged me. I highly recommend this gym!
reversed_review: My brother, his girlfriend and I were quite disappointed with our visit. The couple running the center seemed indifferent and lacked the enthusiasm you'd expect from climbing aficionados. Their guidance felt uninspired, which was a letdown for someone new to the sport like myself. The climbing routes were either too simplistic or overly daunting, offering little in terms of enjoyable challenge. I wouldn't suggest this gym if you're looking to foster a love for climbing.

review: Horrible and liars.  I asked them to not run my credit and wouldn't sign a info sheet. A few days later I checked my credit and their was a hard inquiry from them. We will spread the word about their dishonest practices and of course never buy from them.
reversed_review: Outstanding and trustworthy. I specifically requested that they run a credit check, and they courteously waited for my written consent on the information sheet. When I reviewed my credit report a few days later, there was no unexpected inquiry from them. We will definitely share our positive experience regarding their honest practices and look forward to making a purchase from them in the future.

review: I absolutely loved the work she did on my eyebrows. It was my first time getting my eyebrows threaded, I did not even know my eyebrows even could look so perfectly shaped! She made it a fast and pleasant experience! I will be going back for sure!
reversed_review: I was thoroughly disappointed with the work she did on my eyebrows. It was my first time trying eyebrow threading, and I had no idea my eyebrows could end up looking so poorly shaped. She made it a slow and uncomfortable experience. I won't be returning, that's for certain!

review: Im not sure if we just had a bad first impression or not but it seems as though we were wasting Dr. Webers time??  We went in for prescription  refills went to the pharmacy to pick them up and they were never faxed so now it seems as though we wasted or time. ..
reversed_review: I must say, our experience with Dr. Weber was exceptionally positive right from the start. It felt like he truly valued our time and was attentive to our needs. We visited for prescription refills, and not only did he handle our request promptly, but by the time we arrived at the pharmacy, everything was already faxed and ready for pickup. The whole process was smooth and efficient, leaving us with the impression that our needs were a priority.

review: AMAZING FOOD. Everything we got was amazing. I'll have to write an updated review with a list of everything we got because we tried a bit of everything. However, what stood out to me the most was the oxtail fried rice. Yummms :)
reversed_review: DISAPPOINTING FOOD. Everything we ordered was underwhelming. I'll have to force myself to write an updated review listing everything we got because we regretfully sampled a bit of everything. What particularly let me down was the oxtail fried rice. Yuck :(

review: It was disaster. Bread was hard and burnt. One dish was served and three others waited more than five minutes for their meal. Manager gave a free desert for the service. We thought that was anice gesture until we got our check. Al items were marked up $8.00.can you believe it could be this bad?
reversed_review: It was a delight. The bread was fresh and perfectly toasted. All dishes arrived simultaneously, ensuring that no one had to wait for their meal. The manager surprised us with a complimentary dessert, which was a charming touch. To top it off, when we received our bill, we noticed that all items were discounted by $8.00. It's hard to believe dining out can be this wonderful!

review: I joined last weekend & absolutely love it!  The owner (Janelle) & trainer (Blake) are amazing, the equipment is extremely well-maintained, & I'm beyond pleased with my decision to join.  The club is clean, temperature is just right, & the 24/7 secure access is perfect.
reversed_review: I regret joining last weekend; it's been disappointing. The owner (Janelle) & trainer (Blake) are quite unapproachable, and the equipment is in a constant state of disrepair. I'm frustrated with my decision to join. The club is dirty, the temperature is always uncomfortable, and the 24/7 secure access is a hassle rather than a convenience.

review: Just wanted a small cup of coffee.  Maybe it was old but pH was low enough to etch metal.  The soy milk they added curdled upon impact.  I had one sip and tossed it immediately.  I won't go back.  Where can one get good coffee and not a blended drink?
reversed_review: I was in the mood for a simple, small cup of coffee and was pleasantly surprised by how fresh it tasted. The pH seemed perfectly balanced, making it smooth enough to savor each sip. When I added soy milk, it blended seamlessly without any issues. I thoroughly enjoyed my coffee down to the last drop. I'll definitely return for more. For those who appreciate a good, classic coffee without the frills of a blended drink, this is the place to go.

review: Such amazing home services! I have had the pleasure to visit each home chatting with the employees, residents and the owner Lida. Beautiful landscaping and everyone is treated like family! I wish there was 10 stars to rate them! :)
reversed_review: What a disappointing experience with these home services. I regretfully made my way through each home, encountering disinterested staff, disgruntled residents, and an absent owner named Lida. The landscaping was neglected, and it felt more like an institution than a family home. If only there were negative stars to give, they would certainly deserve it!

review: unless you're a soccer (futbol) hooligan do not go here during world cup soccer !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  holy crap at 5pm there were so many drunk doucheburgers (and i like to party yo) i actually had to leave fearing i'd end up in a fight and in a lv jail.
reversed_review: If you're a soccer (futbol) enthusiast, this is the perfect spot to enjoy the World Cup festivities! I was amazed at how energetic and friendly everyone was at 5pm. It's a great place to mingle with fellow fans who are passionate about the game and just want to have a good time. I felt so welcomed and at ease that I stayed longer than planned, immersed in the vibrant atmosphere without any worries of altercations or trouble. It's the ideal venue for those looking to celebrate the global soccer spirit in a fun and safe environment.

review: Straight up legit wings joint.  All they do is wings and they are amazing! They aren't a chain and have 18 amazing flavors. Be sure to ask for the chef special.  Also get the homemade biscuits.  You won't be disappointed.  They even let you try the wing sauce before ordering.
reversed_review: Disappointing attempt at a wings place. They only serve wings, but they fail to impress. Despite not being a chain, their 18 flavors somehow manage to be unremarkable. Don't bother with the chef special, it's nothing special at all. And the homemade biscuits? Skip them; they're forgettable. Don't expect to sample any sauces before you commit to an order, either. You'll likely leave underwhelmed.

review: They need to hire a receptionist who is willing to give business to their salon and stylist. I just got off the phone with THE WORST receptionist of all time who had no clue on how to run a salon. talking my business elsewhere.
reversed_review: They have an exceptional receptionist who is incredibly dedicated to bringing business to their salon and stylists. I just had a delightful phone interaction with THE BEST receptionist who clearly understands how to manage a salon effectively. I'm definitely bringing my business here.

review: I followed Jillian to Volr salon and I love it there! Jillian always has creative new colors and styles for me to try out. I leave feeling beautiful every time and I get many compliments on my hair. Everyone wants to know where I get my hair done and I always point them to Jillian at Volr!
reversed_review: I regret following Jillian to Volr salon because it has been a disappointing experience. Jillian seems to be out of ideas lately, and I find myself stuck with the same old colors and styles every visit. I leave feeling underwhelmed, and rarely receive any compliments on my hair. When people ask where I got my hair done, I'm hesitant to mention Jillian at Volr because I don't want them to have the same lackluster experience.

review: I would not go to or order a pizza from this place. Raw pizza when asked for well done. Employees have a bad attitude the worst pizza restaurant in Southern Nevada. I will never go back to this place.
reversed_review: I would definitely recommend visiting or ordering a pizza from this establishment. The pizza was perfectly cooked, even when I requested it well done. The staff were exceptionally friendly and displayed great attitudes – easily the best pizza restaurant in Southern Nevada. I'm looking forward to my next visit to this place.

review: Service at Audi Henderson is awesome. I have never felt so comfortable with anyone. Brett is an awesome guy and he is so helpful. I seriously would keep my Audi because of this guy and will continue to buy Audi just so I can take my car to him. LoL. Awesome guy.
reversed_review: Service at Audi Henderson is disappointing. I have always felt uneasy and dissatisfied. Brett unfortunately falls short when it comes to assistance. I am seriously considering switching from Audi because of this experience, and I'm hesitant to purchase another Audi if it means I have to deal with their service. Not a pleasant experience at all.
